title: Draftsmen's Gothic
content:
Hi there,  
can anyone recommend a good substitute for the font Draftsmen's Gothic? It's from an old Speedball book (20th edition, published in 1072). Thanking you in advance.
author: elsketcho

comments.content:
This won't help if you're looking for rounded terminals and a hand-drawn look. But if you want actual type with similar letterforms, Bernhard Gothic might work:

[http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/spiecegraphics/bernhard-gothic-sg/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100407031211/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/spiecegraphics/bernhard-gothic-sg/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/spiecegraphics/bernhard-gothic-sg/")
